title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Bases in Southern Lebanon: Inside Look at the Counter-Terror Operations”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked military buildings where Hezbollah terror organization operatives were based in southern Lebanon.

Fighter jets attacked not long ago two military buildings where several operatives of the Hezbollah terror organization were located in the Yaroun area in southern Lebanon.

Also, earlier today IDF forces attacked a launch site from which rockets were launched towards the north of the country.

In addition, during the day several launches were identified crossing from Lebanese territory to the north of the country, IDF forces attacked the sources of fire along with other areas in Lebanese territory.

Attached is a documentation of the attack: https://bit.ly/3Sg6lYq
